Title: Never Kill a Boy on the First Date
Plot: Buffy sets her sights on the mysterious and brooding Owen, opting to go on a date rather than help Giles prevent a prophecy about an unstoppable vampire rising to help the Master.
GuestStars: Robert Mont, Paul-Felix Montez, Christopher Wiehl, Geoff Meed, Andrew J. Ferchland, Marc Metcalf, David Boreanaz
